Welcome to Online Technik

What is online technik?

Online technik is where you can borrow helpful tools for online teaching era. Rental duration is per semester.

Current open hours

It is run by limited member of hfk students, therefore opening hours can change depending on their situation. Please refer to the website for the opening hours.

October

25 Tue 13:00 - 15:00
27 Thu 13:00 - 15:00

November

Tuesday and Thursday 13:00 - 15:00
except 01 Tue, 08 Tue, 15 Tue

Available resources

USB Webcamera, Studio headphone, headset with microphone, KRK Rokit 7(studio (sound)monitor), Dremel 4000, Zoom H1, laptops

Lottery for laptop rental

Limited amount of laptops are avaliable for 10 month rental. Students who have never rented laptop from us have more priority. For rental, you need to present your liability insurance that covers rental laptops. To apply, please fill in the form:
